rule_sql: SELECT af.row_number, af.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource FROM award_financial AS af WHERE af.submission_id = {} AND (ussgl480100_undeliveredordersobligationsunpaid_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480100_undeliveredordersobligationsunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl483100_undeliveredordersobligtransferredunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl488100_upadjsprioryearundelivordersobligunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490100_deliveredordersobligationsunpaid_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490100_deliveredordersobligationsunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl493100_deliveredordersobligstransferredunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl498100_upadjsprioryeardeliveredordersobligunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480200_undeliveredordersobligationsprepaidadvanced_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480200_undeliveredordersobligationsprepaidadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl483200_undeliveredordersobligtransferredppdadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl488200_upadjsprioryrundelivordersobligprepaidadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490200_deliveredordersobligationspaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490800_authorityoutlayednotyetdisbursed_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490800_authorityoutlayednotyetdisbursed_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl498200_upadjsprioryrdelivordersobligpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL) AND COALESCE(bydirectreimbursablefundingsource, '') = ''
rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".

rule_sql: SELECT approp.row_number, approp.tas, approp.grossoutlayamountbytas_cpe, SUM(op.grossoutlayamountbyprogramobjectclass_cpe) as grossoutlayamountbyprogramobjectclass_cpe_sum FROM appropriation approp JOIN object_class_program_activity op ON approp.tas = op.tas WHERE approp.submission_id = {} GROUP BY approp.row_number, approp.tas, approp.grossoutlayamountbytas_cpe HAVING approp.grossoutlayamountbytas_cpe IS DISTINCT FROM SUM(op.grossoutlayamountbyprogramobjectclass_cpe)
rule_description: GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE (file A) = sum of all GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (file B) {When Program Activity and Object Class are not blank, this value is the sum of all Gross Outlay Amounts reported in file B, by TAS/Subaccount}
rule_error_message: The GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE amount in the appropriation file (A) does not equal the sum of the corresponding GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass_CPE values in the award financial file (B).

rule_sql: SELECT approp.row_number, approp.tas, approp.obligationsincurredtotalbytas_cpe, SUM(op.obligationsincurredbyprogramobjectclass_cpe) as obligationsincurredbyprogramobjectclass_cpe_sum FROM appropriation approp JOIN object_class_program_activity op ON approp.tas = op.tas WHERE approp.submission_id = {} GROUP BY approp.row_number, approp.tas, approp.obligationsincurredtotalbytas_cpe HAVING approp.obligationsincurredtotalbytas_cpe IS DISTINCT FROM SUM(op.obligationsincurredbyprogramobjectclass_cpe)
rule_error_message: The ObligationsIncurredTotalByTAS_CPE amount in the appropriation file (A) does not equal the sum of the corresponding ObligationsIncurredByProgramObjectClass_CPE values in the award financial file (B).

rule_sql: SELECT op.row_number, op.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource FROM object_class_program_activity as op WHERE submission_id = {} AND (ussgl480100_undeliveredordersobligationsunpaid_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480100_undeliveredordersobligationsunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl483100_undeliveredordersobligtransferredunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl488100_upadjsprioryearundelivordersobligunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490100_deliveredordersobligationsunpaid_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490100_deliveredordersobligationsunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl493100_deliveredordersobligstransferredunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl498100_upadjsprioryeardeliveredordersobligunpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480200_undeliveredordersobligationsprepaidadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl480200_undeliveredordersobligationsprepaidadv_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl483200_undeliveredordersobligtransferredppdadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl488200_upadjsprioryrundelivordersobligprepaidadv_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490200_deliveredordersobligationspaid_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490800_authorityoutlayednotyetdisbursed_fyb IS NOT NULL OR ussgl490800_authorityoutlayednotyetdisbursed_cpe IS NOT NULL OR ussgl498200_upadjsprioryrdelivordersobligpaid_cpe IS NOT NULL ) AND COALESCE(bydirectreimbursablefundingsource, '') = ''
rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".

rule_sql: SELECT af.row_number, af.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource FROM award_financial AS af WHERE af.submission_id = {} AND COALESCE(lower(af.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource),'') NOT IN ('', 'r', 'd')
rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: The reimbursable flag indicator (bydirectreimbursablefundingsource) must be empty, R, or D

rule_sql: SELECT op.row_number, op.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource FROM object_class_program_activity AS op WHERE op.submission_id = {} AND COALESCE(lower(op.bydirectreimbursablefundingsource),'') NOT IN ('', 'r', 'd')
rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: The reimbursable flag indicator (bydirectreimbursablefundingsource) must be empty, R, or D
